participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and driven, she enjoys engaging conversations and sharing her experiences.
participant_1.background: I am married to a doctor. I enjoy long walks with my dog. I am a professional tennis player. I live in a three storey house. My family is continuously growing.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Analytical and pragmatic, he approaches life with a practical mindset and values education.
participant_2.background: I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. I grew up in Manhattan. I drive a BMW. My parents are very wealthy bankers.
